text.*:
List of Moroccan flags This is a list of flags used in Morocco. For more information about the national flag, visit the article Flag of Morocco.

Wikimedia Commons has media related to Flags of Morocco.
Wikimedia Commons has media related to Flags of provinces of Morocco (until 1997).

  • 1 National Flags
  • 2 Royal Standard
  • 3 Military Flags
  • 4 Historical Flags
  • 5 Sources
  • 6 External links

Historical Flags[edit]

This section does not cite any sources. Please help improve this section by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (December 2014) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

  • Flag of Morocco (Almohad dynasty 1147-1269)

  • Flag of Morocco, used along with a white banner (Marinid dynasty 1258-1420)

  • Flag of Morocco, used along with a white banner (Saadi dynasty 1554-1659)

  • Flag of Morocco (Alaouite dynasty 1666-1915)

  • Merchant flag of Morocco under the French protectorate

  • Merchant flag of Morocco under the Spanish protectorate

  • Flag of International Tangier

  • Flag of the Republic of the Rif

  • Flag of Morocco in early 20th century
